Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 74th/Racine
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Halsted, 76th, Loomis and 74th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 74th, Halsted, 76th, Loomis and 74th, due to street blockage near 74th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Clark/Belle Plaine
ShortDescription: Northbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Irving Park, Southport, Clark, Montrose and Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Irving Park, Southport, Clark, Montrose and Ashland due to street blockage near Clark/Belle Plaine.
